outcome.description: Check the 'achievements' field in outcome context. Score 0.8-1.0 for late-game achievements (iron tools, furnace, armor). Score 0.5-0.7 for mid-tier crafting (stone tools, furnace prep). Score 0.2-0.4 for early tasks (collecting saplings, wood tools). Score 0.0 if no meaningful achievements.

Check the 'inventory' field in outcome context. Score 0.8-1.0 for abundant wood (>20) plus supporting materials (stone, coal, iron). Score 0.5-0.7 for good wood stores (10-20) with some materials. Score 0.2-0.4 for minimal resources. Score 0.0 for near-empty inventory.

Check 'health', 'food', 'drink', and 'is_alive' fields in outcome context. Score 1.0 if alive with health >50, food >50, drink >50. Score 0.7 if alive but low vitals. Score 0.3 if died but fought well. Score 0.0 if died early or from poor decisions.

If 'is_alive' is false or 'terminated' is true, check if the agent mitigated risks. Score 0.8-1.0 if survived despite danger. Score 0.5-0.7 if died but learned. Score 0.2-0.4 if died from avoidable mistake. Score 0.0 if reckless death.

Assess 'tools', 'inventory', and 'achievements' for next-objective readiness. Score 0.8-1.0 if has tools, shelter, furnace, and materials. Score 0.5-0.7 if has some preparation. Score 0.2-0.4 if barely started. Score 0.0 if no progress.
